Articles Title: Nidahas Trophy, India vs Bangladesh 2nd T20I, Live Cricket Score: India lose Dhawan but stay on course
Articles Description: Nidahas Trophy, India vs Bangladesh 2nd T20I: Shikhar Dhawan (55) scored his second successive fifty as India beat Bangladesh by six wickets in the second T20I of the Nidahas Trophy in Colombo on Thursday.

Articles Title: Senior politician Neiphiu Rio back as Nagaland Chief Minister
Articles Description: National News – Often described as one of the tallest leaders of Nagaland, Rio survived an assassination attempt when a group of armed people ambushed his motorcade at Dimapur in Nagaland on May 20, 1995. He was then the state PWD minister.

Articles Title: NEET 2018: CBSE offers major relief to candidates; extends last date to register, Aadhaar Card no longer mandatory
Articles Description: In a big relief to the NEET aspirants, the Central Board of Secondary Education has extended the last date to register for the examinations. The NEET examination, held for admission to MBBS/BDS courses in India, is scheduled to be held on Sunday, May 6.
